name: Upcycled Black Corduroy Messenger Bag
description:
Upcycled messenger bag constructed from a pair of black corduroy pants. Grey interior made from a cotton twill (new material).

There is grey piping along most of the seams, and stitching details on the flap.

Due to the nature of upcycling all bags are original in design and will not be reproduced. You are gauranteed to have a one-of-a-kind Datchi handbag!

Lining fabric is fused to create more durability and structure.

Details:

- Adjustable strap
- 2 exterior patch pockets
- 1 large interior pocket with
zipper closure.
- 1 large interior patch pocket
with button closure.
- magnetic clasp closure

Dimensions:

24cm x 38cm x 13cm

name: Madeliane 1953 Halter Sundress
description:
1953 Inspired gingham spring/summer sundress dress.

Close fitting bodice with "bamboo" pleating detailing in front, flared knee length skirt. Fully lined.
Halter Tie.

This dress is an original piece that will not be reproduced in the gingham seersucker fabric.

Pleating on bodice was created using Japanese Pattern Making Techniques.

Measurements:

B/C bra cup

Bust: 99cm
Waist: 87cm

Centre back bodice is about 9 cm from base of neck.

Length from Centre Back to Hem: 86cm

*Belt not included* 

This dress is customizable to your size:

please send me your bust, waist, hip measurements plus the length from your natural waist to just above knees (or desired length) You can always contact me for more details. 

More pictures can be found at :http://www.etsy.com/listing/80315658/madeliane-1953-halter-sundress

Dress is available in Black, white, red, red gingham, blue gingham, or black and white polka dots.

Dress pictured is a one off and onmly available in the measurements provided.
The dress pictured is only available

name: Gruss aus Österreich Messenger Bag
description:
Gruss aus Österreich - Greetings from Austria

Upcycled messenger bag constructed from a traditional fabric calender from Austria. Exterior (cotton blue twill) and interior (red cotton linen) fabrics are made from new materials.

Due to the nature of upcycling all bags are original in design and will not be reproduced. You are gauranteed to have a one-of-a-kind Datchi handbag!

All seams are overlocked and exterior fabric is fused to create more durability and structure.

Details:

- Adjustable strap
- 2 medium interior patch pockets
- 1 large interior pocket with zipper closure
- magnetic clasp closure

24cm x 38cm x 13cm 


for more images check out my etsy store : http://www.etsy.com/listing/90666915/gruss-aus-oesterreich-messenger-bag?ref=v1_other_1

name: Upcycled Alpine Trek Messenger Bag
description:
Recycle, Re-Use, Rejoice!

Upcycled messenger bag constructed from atraditional Alpine Blazer. Lining is made from blue cotton twill fabric (new material).

Due to the nature of upcycling all bags are original in design and will not be reproduced. You are gauranteed to have a one-of-a-kind Datchi handbag!

All seams are overlocked and lining is fused to create more durability and structure.

Details:

- Adjustable strap
- 2 medium interior patch pockets
- 1 large interior pocket with zipper closure
- 1 exterior pocket with zipper closure on flap
- magnetic clasp closure

24cm x 38cm x 13cm
